<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Adrivallo](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2021)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 49</row>

**Perception** +16; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Circus Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +21, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +19, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +16, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +21, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +5

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +7
</row>

**Sylvan Wine** ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) Adrivallo's wineskin magically enchants any alcohol inside. With an Interact action, a living creature can imbibe the alcohol and gain a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects for the following hour. When the wineskin is removed from a satyr's person, the magic remains only until the wine spoils. The wineskin holds up to 8 draughts of wine.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), keys to all the cages in the Glen of Uncommon Wonders, panpipes, wineskin

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 210

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 10

**Nimble Dodge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Adrivallo is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker he can see; **Effect** Adrivallo gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+11 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+11 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 29
- **Cantrips (5th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Dirge of Doom](/Spells.aspx?ID=382), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Inspire Competence](/Spells.aspx?ID=385), [Inspire Courage](/Spells.aspx?ID=386), [Triple Time](/Spells.aspx?ID=392)
- **4th**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)

**Fleet Performer**   When Adrivallo Plays the Pipes to cast a spell, he can Step or Stride as part of the activity.

**Play the Pipes** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Requirements** Adrivallo is holding a musical instrument; **Effect** The satyr plays a melody on his instrument to cast [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [_sleep_](/Spells.aspx?ID=288), or [_suggestion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) without expending the spell slot and using his music in place of providing the spell's component actions. The spell gains the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait and targets all creatures in a 60-foot emanation instead of its usual targets. A creature that succeeds at its Will save against any spell cast using this ability is then temporarily immune to spells played from Adrivallo's pipes for 1 minute. Satyrs are immune to this music.

</column>
name: Adrivallo
